headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' 'inline-speculation-rules' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https:; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none';
